item.name: The Adventurers: The Temple of Chac
Batik
item.wantpartslist: The weird concave piece in the light color. I made a replacement. ____ | / |___\

item.name: Cleopatra and the Society of Architects
item.comment: Really like the corruption mechanic. Every really good action in the game has a negative cost so you really have to weigh your decisions carefully.

item.name: Day & Night
item.comment: Fun game for two players, but a player really has to use both decks once to be able to strategize effectively. That's a pretty high investment cost, so I haven't played it too much.

item.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple ‚Äì Big Box
Tales & Games: The Hare & the Tortoise
Tales of the Arabian Nights
item.comment: Good game for 3 players. Any more and there is just too much waiting. I also like to give extra skills at the game start to reduce play time a little bit.
